Package bauernhof.preset

Interface GameConfiguration

  • public interface GameConfiguration
    A game configuration.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Card getCardByName​(String cardname)
      Get a card by its name.
      Set<CardColor> getCardColors()
      All CardColors.
      Set<Card> getCards()
      All Cards.
      String getConfigDescription()
      The description of the game configuration.
      int getNumCardsPerPlayerHand()
      The number of cards dealt to each player on the start of the game.
      int getNumDepositionAreaSlots()
      The maximum number of cards in the deposition area.
      String getRawConfiguration()
      The contents of the xml file that was used for creating this GameConfiguration.

    • Method Detail

      • getConfigDescription

        String getConfigDescription()
        The description of the game configuration.
        Returns:
        The description-

      • getNumDepositionAreaSlots

        int getNumDepositionAreaSlots()
        The maximum number of cards in the deposition area.

        The game ends as soon as the deposition area is full.

        Must be at least 2 and cannot be more than 12.

        Returns:
        The number of slots in the deposition area.

      • getNumCardsPerPlayerHand

        int getNumCardsPerPlayerHand()
        The number of cards dealt to each player on the start of the game.

        Must be at least 2 and cannot be more than 10.

        Returns:
        The number of cards dealt to each player.

      • getCardColors

        Set<CardColor> getCardColors()
        All CardColors.

        Every cardcolor must have a unique name.
        Every cardcolor must be used by at least one card.

        Returns:
        The cardcolors.

      • getCards

        Set<Card> getCards()
        All Cards.

        Every card must have a unique name.
        There must be at least (getNumDepositionAreaSlots() + getNumCardsPerPlayerHand() * 4) cards.

        Returns:
        The card.

      • getCardByName

        Card getCardByName​(String cardname)
        Get a card by its name.

        This function is used by S2CConnection.

        Parameters:
        cardname - The unique name of the card.
        Returns:
        The card or null if no card by that name was found.

      • getRawConfiguration

        String getRawConfiguration()
        The contents of the xml file that was used for creating this GameConfiguration.

        This function is used by S2CConnection.

        Returns:
        The raw xml of this configuration.
